title.rendered: “IDF Launches Successful Strikes Against Hezbollah Targets in Lebanon: In-Depth Coverage and Analysis”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

A military structure alongside additional terror targets; IDF attacked in Lebanese territory

A short while ago, IDF fighter jets attacked a number of terrorist targets of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in Lebanon.

Among the targets attacked were a military post and a military building in the Layda and Marwahin areas, which served the organization’s terrorists alongside other terrorist infrastructure in the Ayta ash-Shab area.

In addition, following the warning about the penetration of a hostile aircraft in the north of the country earlier today, air defense fighters successfully intercepted a suspected aerial target in Lebanon that was allegedly making its way into the country.

Also, during the day several launches were identified crossing from Lebanon into the north of the country.

Attached is footage from the attacks: https://bit.ly/47UzPR8
